page.title: 18ECOLOGY
page.content:
WINTER AND SUMMER. We very rarely have snow and frost. The winters in Newlyn are not very cold. Sometimes we get very strong winds. There is a lot of misty rain.
POLLUTION. Newlyn Beach is polluted because of the sewage system which leaves waste,also the beach is very stony and covered in tar.Plastic bottles & other mucky things.We think Harveys Shellfish Factory pollutes the water by putting boiling soapy water into the river which leads to the sea.On a hot day the sea & beach smells of sewage,dead fish & seaweed,that is why we think not many holiday makers go to Newlyn Beach.We hope something is done about it during the next few years.
